stimulusHtml: Find all values of x, for -7 < x < 7, at which f attains a relative minimum. Justify your answer.

features.html: The figure above shows the graph of f', the derivative of the function f, for − 7 ≤ x ≤ 7 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CCA@ . The graph of f' has horizontal tangent lines at x = -3, x = 2, and x = 5, and a vertical tangent line at x = 3.
